name: Cantankerous Cauldron
description:
Technically the mechanics are in, but it needs some content still.

Make potions based on the customers description. 100 gold items have 1 trait. 200 gold items have 2 traits. Top item in the cauldron takes priority, lower left second priority.

Version 02 - Still only 2 customers, but all ingredients should contribute to potions now.
